content.question: The Supreme Court decision quoted above did which of the following?

choices.label: Brought a rapid end to school segregation in the South.
Prohibited segregation in hotels and restaurants.
Initially affected only schools where segregation was mandated by law.
Affected segregation in the North rather than in the South.

content.answer: Initially affected only schools where segregation was mandated by law.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe the facts, issue, holding, reasoning, decision and majority opinion of required Supreme Court cases.
